title: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When creating report parameters and setting default values for them, the default values are not displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
OB: When creating report parameters and setting default values for them, the default values are not displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
EB: When creating report parameters and setting default values for them, the default values should be displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
SR:
1. Create several report parameters and set default values for them.
2. Drag the report parameters to the layout.
3. Open the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog and verify that the default values are visible.
